data: {"generalSituation":"The band of clouds now covering the coast of Guangdong will thin out today. A dry northeast monsoon will bring mainly fine weather to the coast of southern China in the next couple of days. An intense replenishment of the northeast monsoon is expected to reach the coast of Guangdong next Monday night. The weather over the region will become cool appreciably and windy in the following couple of days. With the monsoon moderating slightly, temperatures over the region will rise gradually in the latter part of next week.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251114","week":"Friday","forecastWind":"North to northeast force 4, east force 4 to 5 later.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy. One or two light rain patches at first.
